org.jasig.cas.web

Class AbstractServletContextInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.web.AbstractServletContextInitializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextInitializer<org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext>, org.springframework.web.WebApplicationInitializer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAuthServletContextListener, OpenIdServletContextListener, Pac4jServletContextListener, SamlGoogleAppsServletContextListener, SamlServletContextListener, SpnegoServletContextListener, WsFedServletContextListener

    @Component
public abstract class AbstractServletContextInitializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextInitializer<org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext>, org.springframework.web.WebApplicationInitializer, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Parent class for all servlet context initializers that provides commons methods for retrieving beans from the context dynamically.
    Since:
    4.2
